response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe is perfectly aligned with your needs and aspirations. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, estimated at $1,500,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,425,000, hoping this would facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions you might have and ensure a smooth process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1425000}
